alert.note: Alert for Frontier; Hayes; Lincoln (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 03 at 7:03PM CDT until July 03 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN FRONTIER...SOUTH CENTRAL LINCOLN AND NORTHEASTERN HAYES COUNTIES... At 703 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Wellfleet, or 13 miles northwest of Curtis, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Wellfleet, Maywood and Hansen Memorial Reserve State Wildlife Management Area. This includes Highway 83 between mile markers 45 and 65. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
